Title: Memories of Adventures Past
Description:
It seems that Azeroth has grown... agitated? Something must have happened when Magni tried to commune with her. 

Past events have now come to life once more. I believe they're Azeroth's memories.

Memories they may be, these Radiant Echoes are all too real and could cause serious danger if left unattended. I ask that you investigate one of them and help however you can.
ObjectivesText: Go the portrait room in Dalaran and use a glowing portal to join a Radiant Echoes event. Once it begins kill the area boss to complete the event.
CompletionText: Radiant Echoes and Radiant Visions, all appearing at once. What could Azeroth be trying to tell us? Or perhaps it's just... instinct.
